arabic: قَالَ قَاۤىِٕلٌ مِّنْهُمْ اِنِّيْ كَانَ لِيْ قَرِيْنٌۙ
transliteration_en: Qaala qaaa'ilum minhum innee kaana lee qareen
transliteration_id: Qāla qā'ilum minhum innī kāna lī qarīn(un).
translation_en: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]
translation_id: Berkatalah salah seorang di antara mereka, “Sesungguhnya aku dahulu (di dunia) pernah mempunyai seorang teman

translation_en: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe
translation_id: yang berkata, ‘Apakah sesungguhnya kamu termasuk orang-orang yang membenarkan (hari Kebangkitan)?

arabic: ءَاِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَّعِظَامًا ءَاِنَّا لَمَدِيْنُوْنَ
transliteration_en: 'A-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaabanw wa 'izaaman 'ainnaa lamadeenoon
transliteration_id: A'iżā mitnā wa kunnā turāban a'innā lamadīnūn(a).
translation_en: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"
translation_id: Apabila kami telah mati (lalu) menjadi tanah dan tulang-belulang, apakah kami benar-benar (akan dibangkitkan untuk) diberi balasan?’”

translation_en: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"
translation_id: Dia berkata, “Maukah kamu menengok (temanku itu)?”

transliteration_en: Fattala'a fara aahu fee sawaaa'il Jaheem
translation_en: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.
translation_id: Maka, dia menengoknya. Lalu, dia melihat (teman)-nya itu di tengah-tengah (neraka) Jahim.

translation_en: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me.
translation_id: Dia berkata, “Demi Allah, engkau hampir saja mencelakakanku.

arabic: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّيْ لَكُنْتُ مِنَ الْمُحْضَرِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa law laa ni'matu Rabbee lakuntu minal muhdareen
transliteration_id: Wa lau lā ni‘matu rabbī lakuntu minal-muḥḍarīn(a).
translation_en: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].
translation_id: Sekiranya bukan karena nikmat Tuhanku, pastilah aku termasuk orang-orang yang diseret (ke neraka).

translation_en: Then, are we not to die
translation_id: Apakah kita tidak akan mati,

arabic: اِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا الْاُوْلٰى وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Illa mawtatanal oola wa maa nahnu bimu'azzabeen
transliteration_id: Illā mautatunal-ūlā wa mā naḥnu bimu‘ażżabīn(a).
translation_en: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"
translation_id: kecuali kematian kita yang pertama saja (di dunia) dan kita tidak akan diazab (di akhirat ini)?”

translation_en: Indeed, this is the great attainment.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya ini benar-benar kemenangan yang agung.

translation_en: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.
translation_id: Untuk (kemenangan) seperti ini, hendaklah beramal (di dunia) orang-orang yang mampu beramal.

arabic: اَذٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا اَمْ شَجَرَةُ الزَّقُّوْمِ
transliteration_en: Azaalika khairun nuzulan am shajaratuz Zaqqom
translation_en: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?
translation_id: Apakah (makanan surga) itu hidangan yang lebih baik ataukah pohon zaqum?

translation_en: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Kami menjadikannya (pohon zaqum itu) sebagai azab bagi orang-orang zalim.

arabic: اِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِيْٓ اَصْلِ الْجَحِيْمِۙ
transliteration_en: Innahaa shajaratun takhruju feee aslil Jaheem
translation_en: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,
translation_id: Sesungguhnya itu adalah pohon yang keluar dari dasar (neraka) Jahim.

translation_en: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.
translation_id: Mayangnya seperti kepala-kepala setan.

arabic: فَاِنَّهُمْ لَاٰكِلُوْنَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِـُٔوْنَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُوْنَۗ
transliteration_en: Fa innahum la aakiloona minhaa famaali'oona minhal butoon
transliteration_id: Fa innahum la'ākilūna minhā fa māli'ūna minhal-buṭūn(a).
translation_en: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya mereka benar-benar memakan sebagian darinya (buah pohon itu) dan mereka memenuhi perutnya dengan buahnya (zaqum).

arabic: ثُمَّ اِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيْمٍۚ
transliteration_en: Summa inna lahum 'alaihaa lashawbam min hameem
transliteration_id: Ṡumma inna lahum ‘alaihā lasyaubam min ḥamīm(in).
translation_en: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.
translation_id: (Setelah makan buah zaqum,) sesungguhnya bagi mereka minuman yang dicampur dengan air yang sangat panas.

transliteration_en: Summa inna marji'ahum la ilal Jaheem
translation_en: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.
translation_id: Kemudian, tempat kembali mereka pasti ke (neraka) Jahim.

translation_en: Indeed they found their fathers astray.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya mereka mendapati nenek moyang mereka dalam keadaan sesat.

translation_en: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.
translation_id: Mereka tergesa-gesa mengikuti jejak (nenek moyang) mereka.

transliteration_en: Wa laqad dalla qablahum aksarul awwaleen
translation_en: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,
translation_id: Sungguh, sebelum mereka (kaum Quraisy), benar-benar telah sesat sebagian besar dari orang-orang yang dahulu.

translation_en: And We had already sent among them warners.
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar telah mengutus (rasul) pemberi peringatan di kalangan mereka.

translation_en: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -
translation_id: Maka, perhatikanlah bagaimana kesudahan orang-orang yang diberi peringatan itu,

translation_en: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
translation_id: kecuali hamba-hamba Allah yang terpilih (karena keikhlasannya).

transliteration_en: Wa laqad naadaanaa Noohun falani'mal mujeeboon
translation_en: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.
translation_id: Sungguh, Nuh benar-benar telah berdoa kepada Kami dan sungguh, Kamilah sebaik-baik yang memperkenankan doa.

transliteration_en: Wa jajainaahu wa ahlahoo minal karbil 'azeem
translation_en: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.
translation_id: Kami telah menyelamatkan dia dan pengikutnya dari bencana yang besar.

translation_en: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]
translation_id: Kami menjadikan keturunannya orang-orang yang bertahan (di bumi).

translation_en: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
translation_id: Kami mengabadikan untuknya (pujian) pada orang-orang yang datang kemudian,

translation_en: "Peace upon Noah among the worlds."
translation_id: “Kesejahteraan (Kami limpahkan) atas Nuh di semesta alam.”

translation_en: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya, demikianlah Kami memberi balasan kepada orang-orang yang berbuat kebaikan.

translation_en: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya dia termasuk hamba-hamba Kami yang mukmin.

translation_en: Then We drowned the disbelievers.
translation_id: Kemudian, Kami menenggelamkan yang lain.

transliteration_en: Wa ina min shee'atihee la Ibraaheem
translation_en: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Ibrahim termasuk golongannya (Nuh).

transliteration_en: Iz jaaa'a Rabbahoo bi qalbin saleem
translation_en: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart
translation_id: (Ingatlah) ketika dia datang kepada Tuhannya dengan hati yang suci,

arabic: اِذْ قَالَ لِاَبِيْهِ وَقَوْمِهٖ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُوْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Iz qaala li abeehi wa qawmihee maazaa ta'budoon
transliteration_id: Iż qāla li'abīhi wa qaumihī māżā ta‘budūn(a).
translation_en: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?
translation_id: ketika dia berkata kepada ayahnya dan kaumnya, “Apa yang kamu sembah itu?

translation_en: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire?
translation_id: Apakah kamu menghendaki kebohongan dengan sesembahan selain Allah?

translation_en: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"
translation_id: Maka, bagaimana anggapanmu terhadap Tuhan semesta alam?”

translation_en: And he cast a look at the stars
translation_id: Lalu, dia (Ibrahim) memandang sekilas ke arah bintang-bintang,

translation_en: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."
translation_id: kemudian dia berkata, “Sesungguhnya aku sakit.”

translation_en: So they turned away from him, departing.
translation_id: Mereka lalu berpaling darinya seraya meninggalkannya.

arabic: فَرَاغَ اِلٰٓى اٰلِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ اَلَا تَأْكُلُوْنَۚ
transliteration_en: Faraagha ilaaa aalihatihim faqaala alaa taakuloon
transliteration_id: Farāga ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā ta'kulūn(a).
translation_en: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?
translation_id: Kemudian, dia langsung menuju ke berhala-berhala mereka (secara diam-diam), lalu berkata, “Mengapa kamu tidak makan?

translation_en: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"
translation_id: Mengapa kamu tidak menjawab?”

translation_en: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.
translation_id: Dia lalu menghadap ke (berhala-berhala) itu sambil memukul dengan tangan kanan(-nya).

translation_en: Then the people came toward him, hastening.
translation_id: Kemudian, mereka (kaumnya) datang bergegas kepadanya.

translation_en: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,
translation_id: Dia (Ibrahim) berkata, “Apakah kamu menyembah patung-patung yang kamu pahat itu?

translation_en: While Allah created you and that which you do?"
translation_id: Padahal Allahlah yang menciptakanmu dan apa yang kamu perbuat itu.”

arabic: قَالُوا ابْنُوْا لَهٗ بُنْيَانًا فَاَلْقُوْهُ فِى الْجَحِيْمِ
transliteration_en: Qaalub noo lahoo bun yaanan fa alqoohu fil jaheem
translation_en: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Buatlah bangunan (perapian) untuk (membakar)-nya, lalu lemparkan dia ke dalam api yang menyala-nyala itu.”

transliteration_en: Fa araadoo bihee kaidan faja 'alnaahumul asfaleen
translation_en: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased.
translation_id: Mereka bermaksud memperdayainya, (namun Allah menyelamatkannya), lalu Kami menjadikan mereka orang-orang yang hina.

arabic: وَقَالَ اِنِّيْ ذَاهِبٌ اِلٰى رَبِّيْ سَيَهْدِيْنِ
transliteration_en: Wa qaala innee zaahibun ilaa Rabbee sa yahdeen
transliteration_id: Wa qāla innī żāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīn(i).
translation_en: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.
translation_id: Dia (Ibrahim) berkata, “Sesungguhnya aku akan pergi (menghadap) kepada Tuhanku. Dia akan memberiku petunjuk.”

translation_en: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."
translation_id: 100. (Ibrahim berdoa,) “Ya Tuhanku, anugerahkanlah kepadaku (keturunan) yang termasuk orang-orang saleh.”
